bibl.title: A notebook roll and a fiscal codex from the Giessen Papyrus collection
bibl.seg: Marcin Kotyl, A Notebook Roll and a Fiscal Codex from the Giessen Papyrus Collection (P.Giss. II) = ArchPF. Beiheft 39.
Berlin - Boston, W. de Gruyter, 2020, xii-157 pp., figg. ISBN 978-3-11-066250-4. €99,95.
bibl.note: P. Giss. II, 127-128. - 127. A Notebook Roll from Philadelphia (72/3 - 76/7 CE). - 128. A Tax Register from the Hermopolite Nome (ca. 352-353 CE).
bibl.seg: P. Giss. II, 127-128. - 127. A Notebook Roll from Philadelphia (72/3 - 76/7 CE). - 128. A Tax Register from the Hermopolite Nome (ca. 352-353 CE).
